definition.en:
Used by PeerTube with the Video Object as 'licence'. Possible value there:
{ "1", "name": "Attribution" },
{ "2", "name": "Attribution - Share Alike" },
{ "3", "name": "Attribution - No Derivatives" },
{ "4", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial" },
{ "5", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - Share Alike" },
{ "6", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - No Derivatives" },
{ "7", "name": "Public Domain Dedication" }
see also [schema.org/license](https://schema.org/license)
definition.de:
Benutzt von PeerTube im Video Objekt als 'licence'. Möglicher Wert dort:
{ "1", "name": "Attribution" },
{ "2", "name": "Attribution - Share Alike" },
{ "3", "name": "Attribution - No Derivatives" },
{ "4", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial" },
{ "5", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - Share Alike" },
{ "6", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - No Derivatives" },
{ "7", "name": "Public Domain Dedication" }
siehe auch [schema.org/license](https://schema.org/license)

{ "3", "name": "Attribution - No Derivatives" },
{ "4", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial" },
{ "5", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - Share Alike" },
{ "6", "name": "Attribution - Non Commercial - No Derivatives" },
{ "7", "name": "Public Domain Dedication" }

definition.es:
